reviews.review_text: Great platform game, if you like Sega master system's Ninja Gaiden you will love this game, its fast, its hard and the retro feeling is superb, the chiptunes are great too and add to the retro feel. Only con i can find its that it could have more bosses variety.

1 major problem, feels like its zoomed in too far, huge sprites. its like playng a tiny gameboy game. its 4:3 only so its even worse. enemies spawn ahead of you and jump right at your face without being able to see them, and you have to make blind jumps too. fake difficulty, basically trial and error and memorization required. annoying  on sale for .99 cents its maybe worth trying if you like this type of game, but ive played alot better modern 'retro'games  could be decent if you could see whats ahead of you and/or if it was widescreen
